description: Manage association between an AzureStackHCI cluster and Automanage configuration profile.

commands.name: az automanage configuration-profile-assignment cluster create
commands.summary: Create an association between an AzureStackHCI cluster and Automanage configuration profile.
examples: az automanage configuration-profile-assignment cluster create -n default -g {rg} --cluster-name {cluster_name} --configuration-profile {profile_id}

commands.name: az automanage configuration-profile-assignment cluster delete
commands.summary: Delete an association between an AzureStackHCI cluster and Automanage configuration profile.
examples: az automanage configuration-profile-assignment cluster delete -n default -g {rg} --cluster-name {cluster_name}

commands.name: az automanage configuration-profile-assignment cluster show
commands.summary: Get information about an association between an AzureStackHCI cluster and Automanage configuration profile.
examples: az automanage configuration-profile-assignment cluster show -n default -g {rg} --cluster-name {cluster_name}

commands.name: az automanage configuration-profile-assignment cluster update
commands.summary: Update an association between a AzureStackHCI cluster and Automanage configuration profile.
commands.syntax:
az automanage configuration-profile-assignment cluster update [--add]
                                                              [--cluster-name]
                                                              [--configuration-profile]
                                                              [--configuration-profile-assignment-name]
                                                              [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                              [--ids]
                                                              [--remove]
                                                              [--resource-group]
                                                              [--set]
                                                              [--subscription]
examples: az automanage configuration-profile-assignment cluster update --n default -g {rg} --cluster-name {cluster_name} --configuration-profile {profile_id_2}
